biotools.summary: The Software Tool for Peptide Specificity Analysis (PeSA) is an open-source software designed as a tool to use in the analysis of peptide arrays, permutation arrays and OPALs. The analysis can be used to generate motifs to share the results as a position-specific scoring matrix (PSSM).

bioschemas.name: PeSA
